cable-ref: "A-269 OF DECEMBER 12, 1973; A-074 OF APRIL 16, 1974 SUMMARY "ACT OF COOPERATION AND INDUSTRIAL COMPLE- MENTATION" WAS SIGNED BY PRESIDENTS GEISEL AND BANZER MAY 22 IN COCHABAMBA. THE ACT IS TO BECOME EFFECTIVE UPON RATIFICATION. COMPLETE TEXT AS PUBLISHED IN NEWSPAPERS BEING SENT BY AIRGRAM TOGETHER WITH OTHER DOCUMENTATION. THIS MESSAGE SUMMARIZES MAIN ELEMENTS OF AGREEMENT WHICH COVERS POSSIBLE GAS SALES TO BRAZIL UNCLASSIFIED UNCLASSIFIED PAGE 02 LA PAZ 03356 01 OF 02 232250Z AND BRAZILIAN ASSISTANCE FOR INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT POLE IN SOUTHEAST BOLIVIA. END SUMMARY.1. ART. 4 IF STUDIES SHOW THEIR TECHNICAL AND ECONOMIC FEASIBILITY (A) BOLIVIAN GOVERNMENT (GOBO) IS COMMITTED TO SELL AVERAGE 240 MILLION CUBIC FEET OF NATURAL GAS TO BRAZIL FOR 20 YEARS ON TERMS AND CONDITIONS (INCLUDING PRICE WHICH CAN BE ADJUSTED EVERY SIX MONTHS IN ACCORDANCE WITH INTERNATIONAL MARKET PRICE) TO BE ESTABLISHED IN CONTRACT BETWEEN PETROLEO BRASILEIRO S.A. (PETROBRAS) AND YACIMIENTOS PETROLIFEROS FISCALES BOLIVIANOS (YPFB); (B) BRAZILIAN GOVERNMENT (GOBR) IS COMMITTED TO COOPERATE IN IMPLEMENTATION OF PROJECTS AND INFRASTRUCTURE NEEDED FOR GAS PIPELINES AND INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT POLE AS SET OUT IN ARTS. 2 AND 3; (C) GOBR IS COMMITTED TO GUARANTEE MARKET FOR PRODUCTS OF BOLIVIAN INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT POLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH TERMS OF ANNEX II OF ACT WHICH SPELLS OUT IN DETAIL PERCENT OF PRODUCTION OF EACH PLANT WHICH BRAZIL AGREES TO TAKE AS MINIMUM AND CUSTOMS AND INTERNAL TAXES THAT WILL APPLY. 2. (ART.3) GOBO WILL PRESENT TO GOBR STUDY ON GAS RESERVES CERTIFYING SUFFICIENT SUPPLIES TO MEET 240 MILLION CUBIC FEET PER DAY FOR 20 YEARS COMMITMENT TO GOBR. GOBO WILL DO STUDIES FOR GAS PIPELINES WITH SUFFICIENT CAPACITY TO SUPPLY BOLIVIAN INDUSTRIES TO BE ESTABLISHED PLUS COMMITMENT TO BRAZIL. GOBR WILL DO STUDIES FOR GAS PIPELINE FROM BORDER TO BRAZILIAN CONSUMPTION POINTS. 3. (ART.2) GOBO AND GOBR WILL COOPERATE TO DO STUDIES FOR (A) STEEL COMPLEX WITH CAPACITY TO PRODUCE ANNUALLY 900,000 M.T. SPONGE IRON AND STEEL AND LAMINATIONS EQUIVALENT TO 500,000 M.T. STEEL; (B) NITROGENOUS FERTILIZER PLANT WITH UREA PRODUCTION CAPACITY OF 1,000 M.T. PER DAY; (C) CEMENT PLANT WITH CAPACITY OF 1,000 M.T. PER DAY AND (D) INFRASTRUCTURE FOR DEVELOPMENT POLE. 4. (ART.1) GOBO AND GOBR AGREE TO CARRY OUT ASAP ESTABLISHMENT OF PLANTS REFEREED TO IN PRECEDING PARA PLUS POWER PLANT. BOLIVIA DISPOSED TO IMPLEMENT (CONCRETAR) GAS SALE TO BRAZIL "IN CONJUNCTION WITH" UNCLASSIFIED UNCLASSIFIED PAGE 03 LA PAZ 03356 01 OF 02 232250Z ESTABLISHMENT OF DEVELOPMENT POLE. 5. ART.5 GOBR WILL FINANCE GOBO STUDIES REFERRED TO IN ART. II(PRECEDING PARA) IN AMOUNT UP TO US$ 10 MILLION, 5 PERCENT INTEREST, 3 YEARS GRACE, 15 YEARS TOTAL TERM. LOAN AGREEMENT TO BE SIGNED WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM SIGNING ACT LOAN PROCEEDS FREELY DISPOSABLE AND CONVERTIBLE. 6. (ART 2.) GOBR AND GOBO WILL ESTABLISH BOLIVIAN- BRAZILIAN ECONOMIC AND TECHNICAL COOPERATION COMMITTEE TO COORDINATE IMPLEMENTATION OF ACT. 7. (ART.8) GOBO AND GOBR AGREE TO STUDY IN LATER PHASE ECONOMIC VIABILITY OF PETRO- CHEMICAL COMPLEX FOR PRODUCTION OF ETHYLENE AND ITS DERIVATIVES WITH POSSIBLE GOBR MARKET GUARANTEE. 8. (ANNEX I). GOBR IS COMMITTED TO (A) FINANCE ALL OF GOBO PURCHASES OF BRAZILIAN GOODS AND SERVICES FOR PROJECTS DESCRIBED IN ARTS. II AND III AT INTEREST RATES AND TERMS EQUAL TO BEST GRANTED BY GOBR TO OTHER COUNTRIES AT TIME REQUESTED; (B) GUARANTEE FINANCING OF UP TO HALF OF PURCHASES OF GOODS AND SERVICES GOBO MAY MAKE IN THIRD COUNTRIES FOR PROJECTS DESCRIBED IN ART. II AT INTEREST RATES AND TERMS PREVAILING IN INTERNATIONAL MARKET AT TIME PURCHASE CONTRACTS SIGNED; (C) FINANCE AT GOBO'S REQUEST LOCAL COSTS OF PROJECTS MENTIONED IN ACT IN AMOUNTS AND AT TERMS AND CONDITIONS TO BE ESTABLISHED; (D) COOPERATE WITH GOBO IN OBTAINING RESOURCES NEEDED FROM IFI'S SUCH AS IDB AND IBRD FOR FINANCING BOLIVIAN PORTION GAS PIPELINES. (ANNEX II) PERCENTAGES OF PRODUCTION FROM DEVELOPMENT POLE THAT GOBR GUARANTEES TO TAKE AS MINIMUM ARE SET OUT IN DETAIL. SUPPLY OF GAS TO BRAZIL WILL DEPEND ON CONCLUSION OF ALL STUDIES; FEASIBILITY OF PROJECTS; SIGNING OF MARKET GUARANTEE, PRICE, FINANCING, AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE CONTRACTS AND COMPLETION OF GAS PIPELINE. IRON AND STEEL PRICES WILL BE SET FOLLOWING COMPLETION FEASIBILITY STUDIES AND ON BASIS COMPETITIVENESS IN BRAZILIAN MARKET. FERTILIZER PRICE AT CORUMBA WILL BE EQUIVALENT TO CIF PRICE SANTOS UREA IMPORTED FROM THIRD COUNTRIES. GAS PRICE WILL BE ESTABLISHED IN PETROBRAS-YPFB CONTRACT.
